mapper.sql: SELECT send_id , send_number , exhibition_id , logistics_name , logistics_number , status , send_by , send_time , receive_by , receive_address , receive_company , create_by , create_time , update_by , update_time , del , remark FROM busi_send
mapper.select:
SELECT bs.send_id , bs.send_number , bs.exhibition_id , bs.logistics_name , bs.logistics_number , bs.status , bs.send_by , bs.send_time , bs.receive_by , bs.receive_address , bs.receive_company , bs.create_by , bs.create_time , bs.remark, be.exhibition_name, be.address, be.organizer FROM busi_send as bs left join busi_exhibition as be on bs.exhibition_id = be.exhibition_id where 1=1
and send_number like concat ('%', #{sendNumber} ,'%')
and exhibition_id = #{exhibitionId}
and exhibition_name like concat ('%', #{busiExhibitions.exhibitionName} ,'%')
and organizer like concat ('%', #{busiExhibitions.organizer} ,'%')
and address like concat ('%', #{busiExhibitions.address} ,'%')
and logistics_name like concat ('%', #{logisticsName} ,'%')
and logistics_number like concat ('%', #{logisticsNumber} ,'%')
and status = #{status}
and send_by like concat ('%', #{sendBy} ,'%')
and send_time = #{sendTime}
and receive_by like concat ('%', #{receiveBy} ,'%')
and receive_address like concat ('%', #{receiveAddress} ,'%')
and receive_company like concat ('%', #{receiveCompany} ,'%')
and create_by like concat ('%', #{createBy} ,'%')
and create_time = #{createTime}
and update_by like concat ('%', #{updateBy} ,'%')
and update_time = #{updateTime}
and remark like concat ('%', #{remark} ,'%')

SELECT bm.material_id AS materialId, bm.material_name AS materialName, bm.material_code AS materialCode, bm.nick_name AS nickName, bm.specifications AS specifications, bm.type AS type, bm.unit AS unit, bm.package_quantity AS packageQuantity, bm.create_by AS createBy, bm.create_time AS createTime, bm.update_by AS updateBy, bm.update_time AS updateTime, bm.remark AS remark, bsmd.send_quantity AS sendQuantity FROM busi_send_material_detail AS bsmd LEFT JOIN busi_material as bm ON bm.material_id = bsmd.material_id WHERE bsmd.send_id = #{id}
AND bm.material_name like concat('%', #{materialName}, '%')
AND bm.material_code like concat('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and bm.del = 1
